creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: large coarse cotton navy blue three-panel rectangle with overlapping horizontal rows of silk embroidered figures incorporating circular metal mirrors; some figures appear to be animals; embroidery is gold and red; blue and white woven geometric pattern braid on right and left sides; gold and red border pattern embroidered on top and bottom
medium: Cotton, silk, metal, mirrors; embroidery, handwoven cloth
title: Woman's head covering
